fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, External Relations, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
F-gas Regulation (Declaration of Conformity) 
WEEE Directive
organisation_name: Daikin Airconditioning Poland sp. z o.o. (DAPO)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Daikin Poland is member of KFCh (Polish Association for Cooling and Airconditioning) , PORT PC (Polska Organizacja Rozwoju Technologii Pomp Ciepła = Polish Association gathering manufacturers of heatpumps) and APPLiA Polska (European Committee of Domestic Equipment Manufacturers), as well as EHI,EPEE and EHPA (European Heatpump Association) via our mother company Daikin Europe NV.
goals__remit: Keep up-to-date and monitor EU-legislation with regards to energy saving programmes, renewable energies, environmental legislation, performance of buildings regulation and related topics.
